servinfo.title: Front Seat Belt Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Front Seat Belt Removal and Installation

item.ptxt: Never attempt to disassemble or repair the seat belt pretensioner (retractor assembly). If any abnormality is found, be sure to replace it with new one as an assembly.

Be sure to read Precautions on Service and Diagnosis of Seat Belt , before starting to work and observe every precaution during work. Neglecting them may result in personal injury or unactivation of the seat belt pretensioner when necessary.
Never measure resistance of pretensioner or disassemble it. Otherwise, personal injury may result.

attention2.ptxt: If seat belt pretensioner (retractor assembly) was dropped from a height of 30 cm (1 ft) or more, it should be replaced.

servinfo.ptxt: Seat belts and attaching parts can affect the vital components and systems of a vehicle.
Therefore, they should be inspected carefully and replaced with genuine parts only.

item.ptxt: The seat belt webbing or strap should be free from damage.

s1.ptxt: Let the seat belt retract fully to confirm its easy retraction.

item.ptxt: The retractor assembly should lock webbing when pulled quickly.
The front seat belt retractor assembly (1) should pass the inspection and should lock webbing even when tilted (approx. 15°) toward the fore and aft or right and left directions.

s1.ptxt: Check retractor assembly (1) with seat belt pretensioner appearance visually for following symptoms and if any one of them is applicable, replace it with a new one as an assembly.

item.ptxt: There is a crack in seat belt pretensioner (retractor assembly).
Seat belt pretensioner (retractor assembly) is damaged or a strong impact (e.g., dropping) was applied to it.
Anchor bolts should be torqued to specification.
It should be secure when latched.

servinfosub.title: Seat Belt Switch
servinfosub.ptxt: Check driver side seat belt switch for continuity by using ohmmeter.

spec.title: Seat belt switch specification
